plot: Rich widow Josefina hires door-to-door salesman Abelardo, who is a dead ringer to her late husband Manolo except for the lack of a mustache, to stay at her house.
title: Ponte el bigote Manolo
plot_es: Rich widow Josefina hires door-to-door salesman Abelardo, who is a dead ringer to her late husband Manolo except for the lack of a mustache, to stay at her house.
plot_en: Rich widow Josefina hires door-to-door salesman Abelardo, who is a dead ringer to her late husband Manolo except for the lack of a mustache, to stay at her house.
